posts.post_content: I found a replacement upgrade for this card.  I'd prefer to trade for a beater EPDG that I don't have ([url]http://tinyurl.com/epdghound[/url]), but will listen to offers for sale as well.  As an FYI, I cracked it out of an SGC A holder.

That's funny... He doesn't look like the messiah.  



Just kidding, friendly bump!
